name: Dark XKCD
description: Darkens the website, and inverts the colors for the images.

user.name: DeathTBO
user.about:
((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

FreeStyler & FreeStyler team or other style-ripper bots are not allowed use my themes on any website.

Under "No Redistribution" license you need to ask me to use or modify my styles. If you want to install them from userstyles.org and only apply to stylish or stylus extensions feel free to do so without asking.

((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

Thanks DestructiveBurn for the beautiful license terms.

additional_info:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://bitbucket.org/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

Version 1.36

Fixed the style not working on urls with "www."

Version 1.35

Added a hue-rotate which corrects the colors on some comics.

Version 1.32

Added support for mobile versions.

Version 1.31

Added an exclusion to "Man Page", changed url-prefix to regexp, and fixed exclusions for direct image links.

Verison 1.3

Fixed a few comics that take place at night having inverted colors (this has to be manual). Also fixed the hoverboard game.

Version 1.1

Fixed text color.
